documents.document: one of the best ever! my wife and i have stayed in some wonderful hotels the world over,but never have we stayed in a hotel with staff as good as those at Casa Camper.thank you so much for being so helpful and pleasent and especially for the little surprises left in our room on hearing of the surprise we got from our son when he told us on the roof terrace that we were to become grandparents it was truly very touching thank you so much to all concerned oh and the hotel itself is fantastic by the way great location and enjoyed the 24 drinks and snacks,see you soon i hope
